Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: இழுக்காமை யார்மாட்டும் என்றும் வழுக்காமை வாயின் அதுவொப்பது இல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: There is nothing comparable with the possession of unfailing thoughtfulness at all times; and towards all persons.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A wise figure, like a celestial guardian, is depicted. Their mind radiates a constant, 360-degree field of pure, vigilant light. This is the light of unforgetfulness ('இழுக்காமை').
Layered_Composition.Midground: This light touches everyone and everything around them ('யார்மாட்டும் என்றும்')—friends, foes, family, strangers. The light acts as a perfect shield, preventing any mistakes or slips in conduct ('வழுக்காமை').
Layered_Composition.Background: In the background, other treasures like gold, crowns, and jewels are shown, but they all appear dull and lifeless compared to the supreme, glowing virtue of constant vigilance.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: There is no greater virtue or possession than unwavering, constant mindfulness towards all people at all times.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The 360-degree field of vigilant light is the central metaphor for constant, all-encompassing mindfulness. Its superiority over material treasures highlights that there is 'nothing comparable' ('அதுவொப்பது இல்').
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A brilliant, pure white or crystalline light radiates from the central figure, dominating the scene. The colors are pure and bright, signifying a flawless state of being.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A centered, symmetrical shot that emphasizes the perfect, all-encompassing nature of this virtue.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with beautiful, ethereal light aura and field effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The central figure is the source of all light in the scene.

Cultural_Anchors: At all times, to all people ('யார்மாட்டும் என்றும்')

Negative_Prompt: flickering light, person being forgetful, dark scene, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the 360-degree light field.
